data.title: ACTFL
meta_keywords: World Language teaching; Language Assessment; Foreign Language teaching
data.meta_description: Enhancing and expanding multilingual and multicultural education worldwide
data.text:
AI Resources

AI is transforming all aspects of language learning. ACTFL is here to help you navigate the changes and thrive in this new landscape. View our resources here.

ACTFL Annual Convention and World Languages Expo

Register today for ACTFL in Philly in 2024! Join 6,000 of your colleagues at the biggest and best world language event of the year!

Enhancing and expanding multilingual and multicultural education worldwide

ACTFL is an individual membership organization of thousands of language educators and administrators from elementary through graduate education, as well as government and industry.

About ACTFL

What's coming up at ACTFL? Browse the latest events and deadlines.

Respect and Recognition

What can you get from being an ACTFL member?

ACTFL empowers educators and helps them develop critical skills and competencies

ACTFL Assessments

Learn more about assessments

ACTFL assessments are used worldwide by academic institutions, government agencies and private corporations for purposes such as: academic placement, student assessment, program evaluation, professional certification, hiring, and promotional qualification.
